title: Need to Love You
description: Chloe Cahillâ€™s dreams changed after becoming pregnant in high school. She married her high school sweetheart just after graduation and together, they welcomed a handsome son into the world. Now that Alex was in preschool, she set her eyes on finding the perfect job. Just when she thought she had it all, one night turned her life upside down once more.Jackson Cahill did the right thing by marrying his pregnant girlfriend. He had no doubts about that. Lately, however, he felt restless in his marriage, and one late night of drinking changed his life. Jackson got himself in a real mess. And this time, the dilemma may just be too big of a disarray for him to get out of.
author: Megan   Smith
